reviewText: I projected this onto the wall during a halloween party.  The images are somewhat scary and you have the option to play several different choices.  The images were impressive.

reviewText: I tried this out so far on my television and it is super freaky. I am greatly looking forward to setting this up with a projector for Halloween!!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Wow, I LOVE this.  The effects are totally creepy and professional looking.  I plan on purchasing the reusable, self cling window film from the AtmosFearfx website.  It's convenient and makes the effects look their best (comes in 2 types, one for night use and one for day/night use).I plan on purchasing the Undead Portraits and the Creepy Crawly DVD's next.  I will be the Queen of Halloween!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I purchased this DVD for our Halloween haunt house trick or treat night.  This DVD has some fantastic special effects if you want to place your flat screen TV in a window or on a wall as a portrait. I purchased it to use as a peppers ghost and all thought the effects are great you have to be exactly precise with the glass reflection I do like this DVD but it is costlyAtmosFX is a great seller and shipped it out fast
Title: N/A

reviewText: I used it for Halloween, and one little boy told use we had the coolest house on the block. Another little boy actually hit his head on the side of the house while trying to see the ghosts since the view was blocked by other kids at the door getting candy.  I used a projector and screen to show the video through my glass storm door.  One warning, two little girls around 3 to 5 were approaching the door when a "ghost" appeared and my wife had to run outside with the candy.  On the plus side, the older girl with the kids enjoyed their reaction, but my wife, not so much.
Title: N/A
